Momo Root detector See how apps are detecting Root. What should I put for this? https://example.com/momo-download
Pixlify GPhotos LSPosed / EdXposed module to add Google Pixel features on Google Photos for any device.
1. Install Magisk, LSPosed Or EdXposed.\n2. Install the apk of this app (available from Releases page.)\n3. Open LSPosed / EdXposed app and enable the module. For LSPosed, Google Photos will be automatically selected.\n 4. Reboot. Enjoy. (If needed, you might need to clear data of Google Photos app).
https://example.com/pixlify-gphotos-download
Steps to use:
